void CNFamilialAnalysisMethodHeteroUPD::run (  )  [virtual]

Run the analysis.

HeteroUPD is when the index inherets both alleles from one parent (i.e. the alleles of the grandparents). (CN=2 + genotype concordance with only one parent)

Implements CNFamilialAnalysisMethod.
